name: Souvenirs from 2050
description:
How to play :

Move with WASD or arrow keys 

Interact with E 

Aim with the mouse

Left click to fire 

Objective :

Your objective is to clean up the city to allow the military to take over the area. You have to be quick to avoid radiation contamination and the zombie infestation. 

Careful planning and quick thinking are required to survive the overgrowing onslaught that awaits you.

Équipe :

Marc-Olivier Rodrigue - Programmeur

Thomas Brouillard-Benoit - Programmeur

Martin Johnson - Programmeur

Asset store assets were used
